patthana8.51:1.1_0: Nasaṅkiliṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.51:2.1_0: Naasaṅkiliṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naasaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.51:2.1_1: Naasaṅkiliṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.51:2.1_2: Naasaṅkiliṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭho ca naasaṅkiliṭṭho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.51:3.1_0: Nasaṅkiliṭṭhañca naasaṅkiliṭṭhañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.51:4.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
